> > 1)Alchemist - basic weapon ?
> throw lead?  or perhaps acid?

Sounds good to me.

> hmm, 5th secial, turn silver into gold

That might not be as usefull as you think. :/  You would have to turn 
the silver into gold before your teammates collect the silver.  On the 
other hand, turning food, blood spots, etc into gold might not be such 
a bad idea.

I have this idea for a character that can walk on water, but I'm just 
not sure if that should be a perk of orc captains.
